document.full_text: the international criminal tribunal for rwanda on tuesday found two former military chiefs guilty of genocide in the 1994 slaughter of ethnic tutsis and moderate hutus, the court said.
document.title: former rwandan military chiefs guilty of genocide
lines_and_colors: the international criminal tribunal for rwanda on tuesday found two former military chiefs guilty of genocide in the 1994 slaughter of ethnic tutsis and moderate hutus, the court said.
